title: Takeaways From Day 1 of the Trump Organizationâ€™s Fraud Trial
description: Prosecutors said the Trump Organization and another family business concealed lavish perks given to its top executives in a scheme to avoid paying taxes. Defense lawyers argued the executives acted on their own in their personal interest and the businesses did not benefit.
dc:creator: Lola Fadulu and Nate Schweber
media:description: Michael van der Veen, left, a defense attorney, arrives Monday for the first day of the Trump Organization trial.
